subtitle.line1: The first app for sharing parking spots between neighbors.

pricing.title: Simple, Fair Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your parking needs. Start with a basic plan and upgrade when you're ready for more features.
pricing.footer: All plans include our core parking sharing features. No hidden fees, cancel anytime.

free.name: Basic Plan
free.description: Perfect for discovering neighbor-to-neighbor parking sharing.
features: Unlimited parking group creation up to 10 members

premium.name: Premium
premium.description: Unlock unlimited parking potential for the best experience.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple, fair, and accessible. Join the parking revolution in 4 easy steps.

createOrJoin.title: Create or Join Groups
createOrJoin.description: Start by creating a parking group with your neighbors. Or join existing groups in your area.

shareSpot.title: Share Your Spot
shareSpot.description: When you're not using your parking spot, make it available to your group members.

earnCredits.title: Earn Points
earnCredits.description: For every hour you share your spot, you earn 1 point to use elsewhere.

useSpots.title: Use Others' Spots
useSpots.description: Spend your earned points to park in other members' spots when you need them.

footer.description: Revolutionizing urban parking through community-driven sharing. Join thousands of users for stress-free and friendly parking.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes our policies and procedures on the collection, use, and disclosure of your information when you use the service.

interpretation.title: Interpretation and Definitions
interpretation.subtitle: Interpretation
interpretation.description: The words with initial capital letters have meanings defined under the following conditions.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.description: For the purposes of this Privacy Policy:

account.title: Account
account.description: A unique account created for you to access our service or parts of it.

affiliate.title: Affiliate
affiliate.description: An entity that controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with a party.

application.title: Application
application.description: Refers to FriendSpot, the software program provided by the company.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: Small files placed on your device by a website.

device.title: Device
device.description: Any device that can access the service, such as a computer or mobile phone.

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.description: Any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual.

service.title: Service
service.description: Refers to the application or the website or both.

serviceProvider.title: Service Provider
serviceProvider.description: Any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the company.

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.description: Data collected automatically, generated by the use of the service.

you.title: You
you.description: The individual accessing or using the service.

dataCollection.title: Collecting and Using Your Personal Data

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.description: We may ask you to provide certain personally identifiable information.

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.description: Collected automatically when using the service.

tracking.title: Tracking Technologies and Cookies
tracking.description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service.

cookies.title: Cookies or Browser Cookies
cookies.description: Small files placed on your device.

webBeacons.title: Web Beacons
webBeacons.description: Small electronic files used to collect statistics.

usage.title: Use of Your Personal Data
usage.description: The company may use personal data for the following purposes:
usage.provideService: To provide and maintain our service.
usage.contact: To contact you via email, phone, or notifications.
usage.businessTransfers: For business transfers such as mergers or acquisitions.
usage.otherPurposes: For other purposes such as data analysis or marketing.

retention.title: Retention of Your Personal Data
retention.description: The company retains personal data as long as necessary.

security.title: Security of Your Personal Data
security.description: We use commercially acceptable measures to protect your data.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.description: The service is not intended for children under 13.

links.title: Links to Other Websites
links.description: We are not responsible for the privacy practices of third-party sites.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.

object.title: 1. Object
object.content: These Terms and Conditions (T&C) govern access to and use of the FriendSpot mobile application and the website https://friendspot.app (hereinafter referred to as 'the Application'). By downloading, installing, or using FriendSpot, the user unreservedly accepts these T&C.

accountCreation.title: 2. Account Creation
accountCreation.content: The use of certain features requires the creation of a user account. The user agrees to provide accurate information and maintain the confidentiality of their credentials. The user is solely responsible for any activity carried out via their account.

userContent.title: 3. User Content
userContent.content: Users can publish content (text, images, etc.) via the Application. The user retains ownership of their content but grants FriendSpot a non-exclusive, free, and worldwide license to host, display, and distribute it as part of the service. The user agrees not to publish any illegal, defamatory, discriminatory, or infringing content.

subscriptions.title: 4. Subscriptions and Payments
subscriptions.content: Certain features are accessible via subscription through Google Play and Apple App Store platforms. Financial conditions (pricing, renewal, cancellation) are defined by each store and apply automatically. Refunds are not managed directly by FriendSpot but only through the stores.

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, design, logo, and FriendSpot brand are protected by intellectual property laws. Any reproduction or use without authorization is prohibited.

feedback.title: 6. Suggestions and Feedback
feedback.content: Any suggestion, idea, or feedback submitted to FriendSpot may be freely used without obligation of compensation.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: FriendSpot makes every effort to ensure the proper functioning of the Application but does not guarantee the absence of errors, interruptions, or data loss. FriendSpot cannot be held responsible for content published by users.

abuseReporting.title: 8. Abuse and Violations Reporting
abuseReporting.content: In case of copyright infringement or illegal content, the user can contact: support@friendspot.com

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.content: FriendSpot reserves the right to suspend or delete any user account in case of non-compliance with these T&C.

applicableLaw.title: 10. Applicable Law
applicableLaw.content: These T&C are governed by French law. Any dispute will be brought before the competent courts in France.
